docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman v2 is currently in development and is not the default version. You may use v2 by either passing ‘version=2’ in the Accept Header or entering api/v2/ in the URL.

methods.name: show

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

examples:
GET /api/subnets/980190962
200
{
  "id": 980190962,
  "name": "one",
  "network": "2.3.4.0",
  "mask": "255.255.255.0",
  "priority": null,
  "vlanid": "41",
  "gateway": null,
  "dns_primary": null,
  "dns_secondary": null,
  "from": null,
  "to": null,
  "domain_ids": [],
  "dns_id": 113629430,
  "dhcp_id": 980190962,
  "tftp_id": 298486374,
  "cidr": 24,
  "dhcp": {
    "name": "DHCP Proxy",
    "id": 980190962,
    "url": "https://somewhere.net:8443"
  },
  "tftp": {
    "name": "TFTP Proxy",
    "id": 298486374,
    "url": "http://somewhere.else"
  },
  "dns": {
    "name": "DNS Proxy",
    "id": 113629430,
    "url": "http://else.where:4567"
  }
}

methods.name: create

params.name: from
params.description: Starting IP Address for IP auto suggestion

params.name: to
params.description: Ending IP Address for IP auto suggestion

params.name: domain_ids
params.description: Domains in which this subnet is part

params.name: dhcp_id
params.description: DHCP Proxy to use within this subnet

params.name: tftp_id
params.description: TFTP Proxy to use within this subnet

params.name: dns_id
params.description: DNS Proxy to use within this subnet

examples:
POST /api/subnets
{
  "subnet": {
    "name": "QA2",
    "network": "10.35.2.27",
    "mask": "255.255.255.0"
  }
}
200
{
  "id": 980190964,
